title: Neem Tree
description: Neem Tree, scientifically known as Azadirachta indica, is a large evergreen tree belonging to the family Meliaceae. A hardy evergreen tree renowned for its medicinal and insecticidal properties. Revered as the “Village Pharmacy” in traditional medicine, every part of the Neem Tree — leaves, bark, seeds, and oil — is used for its antibacterial, antiviral, antifungal, and insecticidal properties. Neem oil is widely used in Ayurveda, organic farming, cosmetics, and natural pest control, while the wood is valued for its durability and termite resistance. It also provides shade and improves soil fertility.
